# price

**Instance Property**

The discount price of the product in the local currency.

## Declaration

```swift
var price: NSDecimalNumber { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProductDiscount/priceLocale] to format the price.

## Getting Price and Payment Mode

- **priceLocale**: The locale used to format the discount price of the product.
- **paymentMode**: The payment mode for this product discount.
- **SKProductDiscount.PaymentMode**: Values representing the payment modes for a product discount.
